name: Death Alley
description:
At Death Alley you play for free, but shoe hire will cost you… YOUR LIFE

Lil’ Jimmy’s risking it all in an infernal bowling tournament against DEATH HIMSELF. Beat’s DEATH’s score, and he’ll get his life back, fail and he’ll be damned to wander those cursed lanes FOREVER.

It’s over the top, arcade bowling!

INSTRUCTIONS:

- ARROWS: Move
- SPACEBAR: Start Bowling!
- Controllers also supported (Analog stick and A button)

CREDITS:
- Jonathan Murphy (@nuclearfriend) - Code
- Dave Lloyd (@DuzzOnDrums) - Code/SFX
- Kyle Olsen (@KyleOlsonmabob) - 2d Art
- Gav Kusters (@gavku) - 3d Art
- Louis Meyer(@louisdmeyer) - Music
